mapper.select: SELECT `user`.avatar,`user`.nickname,counttable.dollCount FROM (SELECT user_id userId , COUNT(*) dollCount FROM capture_success WHERE claw_time >= DATE_SUB(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL WEEKDAY(CURDATE()) DAY), INTERVAL 7 DAY) AND claw_time < DATE_SUB(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL WEEKDAY(CURDATE()) - 7 DAY), INTERVAL 7 DAY) AND is_success=1 GROUP BY user_id LIMIT #{size} ) counttable INNER JOIN `user` ON counttable.userId=`user`.id ORDER BY dollCount DESC

SELECT `user`.avatar,`user`.nickname,counttable.dollCount FROM (SELECT user_id userId , COUNT(*) dollCount FROM capture_success WHERE claw_time >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL WEEKDAY(CURDATE()) DAY) AND claw_time <= NOW() AND is_success=1 GROUP BY user_id LIMIT #{size} ) counttable INNER JOIN `user` ON counttable.userId=`user`.id ORDER BY dollCount DESC

SELECT capture_success.id , commodity.`name` commodityName ,commodity.image commodityImage, capture_success.claw_time clawTime,capture_success.is_success isSuccess FROM capture_success LEFT JOIN commodity ON capture_success.commodity_id=commodity.id WHERE capture_success.user_id=#{userId}

SELECT capture_success.id captureRecordId , commodity.image commodityImage, commodity.`name` commodityName ,capture_success.claw_time clawTime ,DATE_ADD(capture_success.claw_time,INTERVAL 1 MONTH) endTime ,commodity.`value` commodityValue FROM capture_success LEFT JOIN commodity ON capture_success.commodity_id=commodity.id WHERE capture_success.user_id=#{userId} and capture_success.is_success=1 AND capture_success.`status`=#{status} LIMIT #{offset},#{pageSize}
